How many people are affected by leukoencephalopathy with vanishing white matter ?,"The prevalence of leukoencephalopathy with vanishing white matter is unknown. Although it is a rare disorder, it is believed to be one of the most common inherited diseases that affect the white matter.",GHR,leukoencephalopathy with vanishing white matter
What are the genetic changes related to leukoencephalopathy with vanishing white matter ?,"Mutations in the EIF2B1, EIF2B2, EIF2B3, EIF2B4, and EI
